options.manufactureOptionName: California Emissions Exemption for Public Service/Emergency Vehicles (Fleet)
options.description: This exemption may only apply in certain California Emissions states. Ordering dealer is responsible to contact the proper state authorities for clarification on qualifying exempted vehicles for registration. Only available on vehicles sold for authorized public service or emergency service use. Must also use Code 423 when ordering.
options.name: California Emissions Exemption For Public Service/Emergency Vehicles (Fleet)

options.manufactureOptionName: Federal Emissions State Dealer Order for California Emissions States Registration
options.description: Federal Emissions State dealers ordering a California Emissions System (Code 422) are also required to use Code 93N to attest that the vehicle is to be registered in a California Emissions State. Note: It is a violation of Federal law for a Federal Emissions State dealer to sell a vehicle with a California Emissions System for registration in a Federal Emissions State, unless the vehicle also meets EPA standards (i.e., 50-state emissions).
options.name: Federal Emissions State Dealer Order For California Emissions States Registration

options.description: Required code for California Emissions States registration (CA, CT, DE, MA, MD, ME, NJ, NY, OR, PA, RI, VT, WA). Optional code for Cross Border States registration (AZ, DC, ID, NH, NV, OH, VA, WV).
options.name: California Emissions System

options.description: Dealers ordering a vehicle without a California Emissions System and which is being sold/delivered to a California Emissions State dealer are also required to use Code 423 to attest either that the vehicle is not being registered in a California Emissions State or that Code 936 is applicable. Note: In Maine, Rhode Island and Vermont, dealers cannot use Code 423 for customers outside of California Emissions States locations (except Public Service/Emergency Vehicles - Code 936).
options.name: California Emissions System Not Required

options.description: Voice-activated navigation system; SiriusXM Traffic and Travel Link with 5-years of complimentary service in the 48 contiguous United States and D.C.; Note: Subscriptions to all SiriusXM services are sold by SiriusXM after trial expires. Subscriptions are governed by SiriusXM Customer Agreement; see www.siriusxm.com
options.name: Voice-Activated Navigation System

options.description: 6-speed SelectShift automatic transmission; Leather wrapped shift knob; Steering wheel paddle shifters; Remote start system; 3.15 limited-slip rear axle
options.name: 6-Speed SelectShift Automatic Transmission

options.description: Standard and only available in AK, MN, ND, SD, MT, WI and WY states. Other states available via FCSD.
options.name: Engine Block Heater

options.description: Optional in all states for customers with a valid FIN code.
options.name: Engine Block Heater (Fleet)

options.name: Adaptive Cruise Control W/Collision Mitigation And Rain Sensing Wipers

options.name: Equipment Group 400A

options.description: Allows a dealer in states that require California emissions - California, Connecticut, Delaware, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island or Washington - to order Federal emissions for a vehicle that will be registered in a state that has Federal emission requirements. Do not use for vehicles that will be registered in California, Connecticut, Delaware, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island or Washington. Not available in Maine or Vermont.
options.name: California Emissions Override

options.description: For dealers ordering vehicles in (YF5) or (NE1) emission states - California, Connecticut, Delaware, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont and Washington). Allows a California dealer (YF5 emissions) to order (NE1) emissions with (NB9) emissions override code for registration in (NE1) states; or, a Connecticut, Delaware, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont and Washington dealer (NE1 emissions) to order (YF5) emissions with (NB9) emissions override code for registration in California.
options.name: State-Specific Emissions Override

Compatible with Pandora, TuneIn radio, stitcher and Siri Eyes Free for compatible smartphones.; Custom Leather Wrapped Interior Package featuring leather-wrapped upper instrument panel; upper door trim panels and console storage cover; Performance data and video recorder; Sueded Microfiber-Wrapped Upper Interior Trim Package including visors, trim above windshield and A-pillar trim

options.description: Allows a dealer in states that require California emissions - California, Connecticut, Delaware, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island or Washington - to order Federal emissions for a vehicle that will be registered in a state that has Federal emission requirements. Do not use for vehicles that will be registered in California, Connecticut, Delaware, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island or Washington. Not available in Maine or Vermont.

options.description: For dealers ordering vehicles in (YF5) or (NE1) emission states - California, Connecticut, Delaware, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont and Washington). Allows a California dealer (YF5 emissions) to order (NE1) emissions with (NB9) emissions override code for registration in (NE1) states; or, a Connecticut, Delaware, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont and Washington dealer (NE1 emissions) to order (YF5) emissions with (NB9) emissions override code for registration in California.

options.description: For dealers ordering vehicles in (YF5) or (NE1) emission states - California, Connecticut, Delaware, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont and Washington). Allows a California dealer (YF5 emissions) to order (NE1) emissions with (NB9) emissions override code for registration in (NE1) states; or, a Connecticut, Delaware, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont and Washington dealer (NE1 emissions) to order (YF5) emissions with (NB9) emissions override code for registration in California.
options.name: State-Specific Emissions Override

options.description: Allows a dealer in states that require California emissions - California, Connecticut, Delaware, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island or Washington - to order Federal emissions for a vehicle that will be registered in a state that has Federal emission requirements. Do not use for vehicles that will be registered in California, Connecticut, Delaware, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island or Washington. Not available in Maine or Vermont.
